I'm going to explain to you something of the art of enchanting items, equipping glyphs and configuring your EP.

1. Enchanting Items
Press to bring up your inventory and use Velik's gear crates. Inside you'll find a +15 Enchantment Scroll (100%) to enchant your gear. Right-clicking the scroll will turn your cursor into a cog. You can then click on the item you wish to enchant.

2. Equipping Glyphs
Press to open your inventory and use Mystel's Awakened Glyph Box to receive a glyph. Right-click the glyph to equip it.

3. EP Configuration
Open up the EP window by clicking My Character -> EP. Decide which EP you want to increase and spend the points to strength your character.

4. Next Stage
Press to open your inventory, then right-click the Echo: Stepstone Isle.
